alert.note: Alert for Codington; Deuel; Grant; Hamlin; Roberts (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 9:28PM MDT until June 20 at 9:45PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR WESTERN DEUEL...SOUTHWESTERN ROBERTS...EASTERN HAMLIN...WESTERN GRANT AND EASTERN CODINGTON COUNTIES... At 1028 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Finley Heights Housing to near Rauville to Stone Bridge, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Watertown, Sisseton, Estelline, Castlewood, Lake Norden, Hayti, Summit, South Shore, Waverly, Kranzburg, Goodwin, Stockholm, Strandburg, Ortley, Troy, Marvin, Finley Heights Housing, Bullhead Lake, Stone Bridge and Rudebusch Corner. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
